name: Dyschromatopsia (Prototype)
description:
An idol game prototype where the player becomes a idol group manager with dychromatopsia. Although the manager fails to see the color of these girls' hair or eyes, as spending time together, they can recognize the girls' spiritual colors based on the knowledge and understanding of their personalities. Meanwhile, the manager's attitude and opinions are also influencing the growth of the girls.

Sliders:

1 - Affection level. In the real game this should be a statistic to be developed. Here it can be directly controlled to see the strengthening of the spiritual color.

2 - R value of spiritual color. Non-interactable.

3 - G value of spiritual color. Non-interactable.

4 - B value of spiritual color. Non-interactable.

*Individual project*
